meanings.definition: Deoxidizers: substances that remove oxygen from a chemical compound.
meanings.sent1: The deoxidizers in the lab helped in purifying the metal.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers use deoxidizers to improve the quality of steel.
meanings.sent3: The deoxidizers had a party in the test tube, leaving the oxygen out.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as a deoxidizer, removing any doubts from her mind.
meanings.sent5: The deoxidizers worked like tiny oxygen magnets, pulling the element away.

meanings.definition: Deoxidizers: agents that prevent oxidation by removing oxygen from a system.
meanings.sent1: The deoxidizers in the food packaging industry help keep products fresh.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use deoxidizers to preserve fruits and vegetables during transportation.
meanings.sent3: The deoxidizers went on strike, causing chaos in the oxygen removal process.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor acted as a deoxidizer, preventing any tension from building up.
meanings.sent5: The deoxidizers functioned like oxygen guardians, shielding the system from harm.
